title: The Road to Terror: Stalin and the Self-Destruction of the ...
description:
The Road to Terror: Stalin and the Self-Destruction of the Bolsheviks, 1932-39 - J. Arch Getty, Oleg V. Naumov [epub]

Now updated with new facts, and abridged for use in Soviet history courses, this gripping book assembles top secret Soviet documents, translated into English, from the era of Stalinâ€™s purges. The dossiers, police reports, private letters, secret transcripts, and other documents expose the hidden inner workings of the Communist Party and the dark inhumanity of the purge process.

â€œ[This] book will be of great value to students of the Terror and . . . the material, such as Bukharinâ€™s last letter, is astounding.â€â€”Michael J. Ybarra, Wall Street Journal

â€œIt will be indispensable for all historians and researchers of communism, the USSR, and Stalinism for many decades to come.â€â€”Roy A. Medvedev, author of Let History Judge
